review_data.title: Top burger place in Zurich
review_data.content: Excellent food. Much better quality than the usual fast food outlets. The quality of the bun was good, the size of the burger inside was good. The fries were lovely. Overall, a very enjoyable dining experience

review_data.title: quick preparation, good food
review_data.content: The staff was very kind and patient. The meal was delicious. (We were very hungry and the burgers and the fries were ready very fast.)

review_data.title: Amazing place, friendly service and great food!
review_data.content: Fantastic food, friendly staff, great menu options and lovely atmosphere. The place is amazing and I am so happy about the sweet potato fries!

review_data.title: Good compromise

review_data.title: Amazing vegetarian salad!
review_data.content: The SPICY AVOCADO & LIME warm salad is simply delicious!!! I loved it so much I tried to replicate the recipe at home (but wasn't successful...). The ingredients taste so good and fresh. You can make it vegan by asking them to exclude the feta...More

review_data.title: Nice and healty burgers
review_data.content: Not my favourite burger spot but another good and organic version of classic fast food. Made with fresh ingredients it is a good option for a healthier burger. Makes fun to go there.
